snippet: Rain fell on Indianapolis on Saturday, and good restaurants were crowded (although diners could get a seat at most of them). Downtown Comics was a little quieter, after a busy week (bobbleheads sold out).
abstract: Rain fell on Indianapolis on Saturday, and good restaurants were crowded (although diners could get a seat at most of them). Downtown Comics was a little quieter, after a busy week (bobbleheads sold out).
lead_paragraph: Throughout the week, Mike Tanier will be out and about and filing dispatches from the Super Bowl city.

headline.main: Everything Indy: It's Not Always Fair Weather (But the Food's Good)
